actions.name: AcceptAgreementApprovalRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to approve an incoming subscription request (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

actions.name: AcceptAgreementRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to accept their agreement requests. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

actions.name: CancelAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to users to cancel their agreements. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

actions.name: CancelAgreementRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to cancel pending subscription requests for products that require subscription verification

actions.name: CreateAgreementRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to create an agreement request. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

actions.name: DescribeAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to users to describe the metadata about the agreement

actions.name: GetAgreementApprovalRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to view the details of their incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

actions.name: GetAgreementRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to view the details of their subscription requests for data products that require subscription verification

actions.name: GetAgreementTerms
actions.description: Grants permission to users to get a list of terms for an agreement

actions.name: ListAgreementApprovalRequests
actions.description: Grants permission to users to list their incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

actions.name: ListAgreementCharges
actions.description: Grants permission to users to view charges associated with their agreements

actions.name: ListAgreementRequests
actions.description: Grants permission to users to list their subscription requests for products that require subscription verification

actions.name: ListEntitlementDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to users to view details of the entitlements associated with an agreement. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

actions.name: RejectAgreementApprovalRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to decline an incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

actions.name: SearchAgreements
actions.description: Grants permission to users to search their agreements

actions.name: Subscribe
actions.description: Grants permission to users to subscribe to AWS Marketplace products. Includes the ability to send a subscription request for products that require subscription verification. Includes the ability to enable auto-renewal for an existing subscription

actions.name: Unsubscribe
actions.description: Grants permission to users to remove subscriptions to AWS Marketplace products. Includes the ability to disable auto-renewal for an existing subscription

actions.name: UpdateAgreementApprovalRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to users to make changes to an incoming subscription request, including the ability to delete the prospective subscriber's information (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

actions.name: UpdatePurchaseOrders
actions.description: Grants permission to users to update purchase orders for charges associated with their agreements

actions.name: ViewSubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to users to see their account's subscriptions
